spec_data.Name: perl-Plack-Test-ExternalServer
spec_data.Description:
This module allows you to run your Plack::Test tests against an external
server instead of just against a local application through either mocked
HTTP or a locally spawned server.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:13:12 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Run HTTP tests on external live servers
